channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: 2 federal officers fired shots during encounter that killed Alex Pretti, DHS tells Congress
item.description: A Customs and Border Protection official told Congress in a notice that two federal officers fired shots during the encounter that killed ICU nurse Alex Pretti in Minneapolis.

item.title: Man arrested after spraying unknown substance on Rep. Ilhan Omar at Minneapolis town hall
More ‘No Kings’ protests planned for March 28 as outrage spreads over Minneapolis deaths
